abstract: Defense Dept confirms death of American service member in fight against Islamic State militant group.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified four American service members who have died supporting the operation to eliminate the Islamic State militant group.
snippet: The Department of Defense has identified four American service members who have died supporting the operation to eliminate the Islamic State militant group.
